👇🏻 Latest article

post0.caption:
What an adrenaline entering my Big 4! Haha 😢

Thank you to many beautiful greetings, sorry for missing in action for the past week. I was overwhelmed with work!! ❤️🙏🏻

I'm counting my blessings, despite my busy schedule, my family, my buddies and my boss still surprise me with little small celebrations 🍾 thank you for your efforts and loves! 👍🏻

Also thanks to my Sunday class students for the surprise! ❤️❤️❤️

I'm really blessed and grateful to have everyone's loves and kindness! Thank you so much! ❤️🙏🏻

To me, Health is the most important, so I sincerely wish everyone good health and happiness! ❤️👍🏻

Wishing my lovely family, my beautiful buddies and beautiful boss and friends, good health and happiness. ❤️👍🏻

I'm happy to say, I can celebrate now hahahahahaha parties time 🥳

post1.caption:
A wonderful evening at the @HSBC Premier event at Four Seasons Hotel last night.

Glad to meet new friends and learn many great tips and insights from the experts... ❤️👍🏻

It started with Eugene Wong's educational sharing on Sake, and our show time with Wayne Fong's for his insightful currencies forecasts, our beautiful gorgeous, and amazing Maxine Teo, with her vivacious personality who gave an exuberant performance! And of course, me sharing on traveling... haha what else right? LOL

A bonus and surprise to meet a new elegant friend, Connie Yeung. We had a great chat and laughter! 😍👍🏻

Last but not least, thanks to Lee Wei Cai for entrusting me again with this important responsibility. I had heaps of fun, till next time! 🥰🙏🏻

post2.caption:
When you posses the light within, you see it eternally! ❤️👍🏻

Follow what lights you up, and you'll light up the world. 🥰👍🏻

Have a beautiful Sunday! ❤️🙏🏻👍🏻

post3.caption:
We can know only that we know nothing! And that's the highest degree of wisdom! 🙏🏻

While everyone knows Russia and Ukraine conflict, not many people knows about the conflict that is happening in Ethiopia! ❤️🙏🏻

The atrocities happening in Ethiopia is no less than what's happening elsewhere in the world. 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

I'm praying everyday. When can the world have peace and human learn to take a chill pill? 🙏🏻🙏🏻🙏🏻

post4.caption:
Behind every mask there's a face and behind that face there's a story! ❤️👍🏻

Today, I'm gonna tell you a story...

Recently, some people commented that I look better with mask on! 🙄

It honestly destroy my confidence! 😢

But thinking positively, at least I can still look good with mask! 🤣🤣🤣

Wish you a happy hump day! ❤️👍🏻

#staypositive #staystrong #moveon

post5.caption:
May every sunrise hold more promise! 😍👍🏻

May every sunset hold more peace! ❤️👍🏻 

Wish everyone a peaceful week ahead with your promise fulfilled! 😍👍🏻

post6.caption:
[Finally, I moved @travelinspiration360]

Migration is an expression of the human aspiration for dignity and safety and for people seeking for better future. It's a feature of globalisation. ❤️👍🏻

As a saying goes, "Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will." I always have been wanting to move @travelinspiration360 website to another web hosting. Finally, I moved my website to @exabytes_sg ! haha 😍👏🏻

My only regret now is I should have done that many many years ago! Well, I guess it's better late than never. I'm grateful for migrating my website over for better performance, coverage, storage, bandwidth, and much lesser price! 🥰👍🏻

Read on to find out why I have to move... 👇🏻

Article Link: https://travelinspiration360.com/10-reasons-why-i-migrated-travel-inspiration-360-website-to-exabytes/

Or click bio link

post7.caption:

Check out the newly launched Creative Zen Hybrid ANC Headphones that can cancel up to 95% noise from surroundings and let you immerse in your own world! 🥰👍🏻

post8.caption:
[𝐅𝐢𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐥𝐲 𝐍𝐞𝐰 𝐏𝐨𝐬𝐭 & 𝐈𝐭'𝐬 𝐀𝐛𝐨𝐮𝐭 𝐉𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐍 𝗩𝗲𝗴𝗲𝘁𝗮𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗻!!!]

How many of you miss Japan very much? 🙋🏻‍♂️

After a long hiatus due to the pandemic, I have finally returned  back to writing again! LOL Thank you everyone for giving me the support and loves. All is well and I hope you are well too. 🍎🙏🏻

Many people believed it's hard to find nice delicious vegetarian food in Japan and asked if I was able to eat well when I was in Japan! 🇯🇵

To be honest, I wasn't sure until I revisited Tokyo in December 2019. Together with my family, we managed to find many nice options for vegetarians. This article is two years late, but thankfully the eateries listed are still in business! (Note: one of the restaurants from my list has closed down) 🥗🥘🫕🍜🍛🍣🍱

Recently, the Prime Minister of Japan, Fumio Kishida, announced that Japan is aiming to reopen international tourists in June 2022. I believe many of you are waiting to "cheong" Japan again! LOL 🧳✈️

Whether you are travelling in tour groups or not, I hope this guide will come in handy for your near future travel to the beautiful land of the rising sun! 🇯🇵

There are some upcoming exciting trips somewhere, I will be writing and covering more stories on @travelinspiration360 😍🙏🏻

Remember to like, share and comment to show your support. Follow my Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube for more new content from now. ❤️🙏🏻

https://travelinspiration360.com/japan-finally-reopens-to-tourism-10-vegetarian-food-in-tokyo-japan-you-shouldnt-miss/

*Click on bio link or IG stories for easy access! 😍👍🏻

post9.caption:
If you want to enjoy the rainbow, be prepared to endure the storm! ❤️🙏🏻

Being alone has a power that very few people can handle, but once you have done it, it will change your life endlessly! 😍🙏🏻

Allow things to come and go, keeping your heart as open as the sky! 😍👍🏻

Wishing you a beautiful week ahead. ❤️👍🏻

post10.caption:
A lot of people always think traveling means shopping, eat and sleep. haha But those "lucky" ones who travelled with me before will know there is no such luxury at all, no time to shop, usually food will be plain and simple especially i'm a vegetarian. As time is always scarce, therefore, usually will wake up very early in the morning to cover the morning actions and scenery, and typically ends my day very late at night with journals, emails, managing social media platforms, and organizing media files. 😍🙏🏻

Traveling is brutality. It forces you to trust strangers and lose sight of all the familiar conforms from home and loves from family & friends. ❤️🙏🏻

You are constantly off the balance and nothing is yours except the essential things.

It stretches not just physically, but also my mind with new experiences, and cultural differences, which sometimes challenge my psychological beliefs too. 😍🙏🏻

As Lao Tzu said, "A journey of a thousand miles, begins with a single step!". ❤️🙏🏻

What a lot of people don't know is that many times, the step I chose to make, is difficult! ❤️🙏🏻

Don't get me wrong, I am not complaining! haha I LOVE WHAT I AM DOING because this is my passion! Without passion, I won't be able to create such beautiful memories and collages. ❤️🙏🏻

Grateful to heaven for giving me the opportunities to see and learn so much! As things are opening up, I am excited about some upcoming jobs, collaborations and trips! Can't wait but yea, still a lot of work ahead... Will continue to work hard! Let's fight for our dreams, fighting! 😍🙏🏻

post11.caption:
Having a dream is like having sunshine. Without it, you cannot see as clear. With it, your world shines. 🌟🙏🏻

Have a dream, and the light will fill your eyes with hope. ❤️👍🏻

May there always be light in your life to guide you, making your life journey full of joy and wonder. 🥰👍🏻

Have a beautiful Tuesday! ❤️🙏🏻

post1.caption:
Despite the depressing situation in the world facing the world pandemic, I was invited by Geylang Serai CC and I'm happy to catch up with my friend @you_yi aka renowned TV host! ❤️👍 .
No doubt the pandemic is nothing near over, and it seems like a depressing long battle for it. I am happy to be able to share my experiences and stories collected around the world, from my years of traveling, which may help us fight the battle for the long run; mentally, emotionally, physically, and psychologically! ❤️👍 .
Some highlights covered in this interview were:
- successful tips to travel blogging
- how I transit from travel blogger to corporate trainer
- 3 tips to adapt to change amid covid19
- stories from South America on language isn't a barrier
- stories from Africa, what's reality?
- stories from Balkans about the price of the peace
& answering questions from live commenters + many more... .
If you like the content, the best way to give me your support is to like, comment, and share, please! ❤️👍 .
#covid19 #sglockdown #lockdownsg #SGUnited #circuitbreakersg #sgcircuitbreaker #Singapore #Singapore2020 #stayhomesg #stayhomewithst #wecanovercome #togetherwecanovercome #circuitbreaker #stayhomeforsg #sghome #singaporeans #sgtravel #sginfluencer #sginterview #mediacorp

post3.caption:
One of my most memorable work in 2019 is @experiencemacao
@macaotourismmalaysia
.
Since my last visit to Macao in 1995 (almost 25 years ago), I never thought that Macao would have changed so much over the past two decades! Besides what many people know Macao as the "game" city, this tiny city in the Southern part of China has so much to offer. Entertainment, history, food, culture, sports, & Instagrammable spots there are many surprises in every corners of the city. 🙆🏻‍♂️
.
Thank you @cctv for the special feature in this episode. As mentioned in the press, I will be back! :-)
.
There will be more adventures in 2020... stay tuned... the ♥️👍🏻
.
Full Episode (Video Source): https://www.facebook.com/761870613900500/posts/3164312703656267/
.
#澳門二十年 #macao25

post10.caption:
Let's Check In Into The Newest Hotel In Melbourne! ❤👍
.
Situated conveniently at the CBD area in South Bank, the Shadow Play By Peppers is definitely a hotel for sophiscated guests, especially for families, businessman or individuals who enjoy the homely and luxurious stay. 😍👍
.
My personal opinion? I really love the living room and the open kitchen concept. It is super spacious and wish I had my family or friends with me. The bed is soooooo comfortable and I doubt I even moved throughout my sleep! 😴👍
.
Most impressively, I'm able to swim outdoor in the cold autumn/winter in Melbourne, due to the heated pool. OMG! Check out the video for more. 😎👍
.
Thanks to @accor_group @accorhotels @peppershotels #ShadowPlayByPeppers I get to enjoy Melbourne. 🥰👍
.
Up next, SYDNEY! :-)
.
#accorhotels @peppershotels #accorgroup #peppershotels #melbourne #australia #instahotel #luxurytravel
